message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000. Considering its quality and the unique features it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while securing this exceptional item before it potentially becomes more widely available. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your positive response.
